But let us not be betrayed from a defence
into a critical history of Poetry & its influence
Be it
on society. It is enough to poi have
pointed out of the effects of Poetry in the

own & all succeeding times, & to revert to

-trations of an opinion the reverse of

But Poets have been challenged to
resign the civic crown to reasoners &
mechanists on another plea. It is
admitted that the exercise of the
delightful
imagination is more beaful but it is
alledged that that of the reason is
as the ground of this distinction
